title: How to Make Porridge Using a Microwave

steps.headline: Tip in the half-cup of porridge oats.
Pour in the cup of milk.
Place in the microwave for 2 1/2 minutes on full power.
Take the bowl out of  the microwave.
Put back in the microwave for 2 minutes on the second highest power.

text: Tip in the half-cup of porridge oats.  Pour in the cup of milk.  Place in the microwave for 2 1/2 minutes on full power.  Take the bowl out of  the microwave.  Stir.  Put back in the microwave for 2 minutes on the second highest power.  Take out of the microwave.  Stir.  Add your toppings.  Serve and enjoy.
